meanings.definition: A child of one's son or daughter.
meanings.sent1: My grandkid loves playing with their toys.
meanings.sent2: I am excited to spend time with my grandkid this weekend.
meanings.sent3: My grandkid always makes me laugh with their silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Watching my grandkid grow is like witnessing a beautiful flower bloom.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my grandkid fills our home with joy.

meanings.sent1: My grandkid enjoys reading books with me.
meanings.sent2: I cherish the moments I spend with my grandkid.
meanings.sent3: My grandkid's curiosity about the world is endless.
meanings.sent4: The bond between a grandparent and grandkid is special and heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The innocence of a grandkid's smile is priceless.
